DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Explorer view - Highlighting that indicates the resource state
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Highlighting that indicates the resource state

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The resource is the same online and offline.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The resource does not belong to the project you are currently working in. The current state will not be highlighted for such resources.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The resource is new and was never published, i.e., it is only present in the offline version of the VFS.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The resource has changed, i.e., it is present in the online and the offline project, but the versions differ.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The resource was deleted in the offline version of the VFS, but it still exists online, i.e., it has not yet been published since it was deleted.
